meanings.definition: The action of using up a resource
meanings.sent1: Excessive consumption of water can lead to dehydration.
meanings.sent2: His daily consumption of snacks is quite high.
meanings.sent3: The robot's consumption of batteries was so high, it needed a recharge every hour.
meanings.sent4: Her consumption of novels was insatiable, devouring one book after another.
meanings.sent5: The consumption of fruits and vegetables is essential for a healthy diet.

meanings.definition: The purchase of goods and services
meanings.sent1: Online consumption of products has increased during the pandemic.
meanings.sent2: Her consumption of clothes is a reflection of her personal style.
meanings.sent3: His consumption of gadgets rivals that of a tech enthusiast.
meanings.sent4: The country's consumption of foreign goods was at an all-time high.
meanings.sent5: Consumer consumption drives the economy forward.

meanings.definition: A wasting disease causing fever and weight loss
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with consumption after weeks of unexplained symptoms.
meanings.sent2: In the 19th century, consumption was a common and deadly illness.
meanings.sent3: The character in the novel suffered from consumption, adding a tragic element to the story.
meanings.sent4: The historical records showed a high mortality rate due to consumption in the past.
meanings.sent5: The protagonist's battle with consumption was a central theme in the book.
